function getPotState() view returns (uint256 totalAmount, uint256 entryCount, uint256 uniqueParticipants, uint256 timeRemaining, bool isActive, uint256 potId)
function getConfig() view returns (tuple(uint256 timerDuration, uint256 minParticipants, uint256 idleTimeout, uint256 feePercentage, uint256 minEntryAmount))
function getEntry(uint256 index) view returns (tuple(address user, uint256 amount, uint256 timestamp))
function owner() view returns (address)
function getCurrentPot() view returns (uint256, uint256, uint256, uint256, bool, uint256)
function potState() view returns (uint256, uint256, uint256, uint256, bool, uint256)
function currentPot() view returns (uint256, uint256, uint256, bool)
function entries(uint256) view returns (address, uint256, uint256)
function enterPot() payable
function enterPotWithAmount(uint256 amount) payable
function enterPotFor(address player, uint256 amount)
function joinPot() payable
function lockGame()
function finishGame(bytes32 eosBlockHash)
function setConfig(uint256 timerDuration, uint256 minParticipants, uint256 idleTimeout, uint256 feePercentage, uint256 minEntryAmount)
function setOperatorApproval(address operator, bool isApproved)
function isApprovedOperator(address operator) view returns (bool)
function withdrawFees()
function emergencyPause(bool pause)
event PotEntered(address indexed user, uint256 amount, uint256 potId)
event PotStarted(uint256 potId, uint256 timerDuration)
event PotEnded(uint256 potId, address indexed winner, uint256 totalAmount)
event GameLocked(uint256 indexed potId, uint256 timestamp)
event GameFinished(uint256 indexed potId, address indexed winner, bytes32 eosBlockHash)
event ConfigUpdated(uint256 timerDuration, uint256 minParticipants, uint256 idleTimeout, uint256 feePercentage, uint256 minEntryAmount)
event OperatorApprovalChanged(address indexed operator, bool isApproved)
